problems.title: Count Paths in Grid (Right and Down Only)
problems.description:
Given an integer N, consider an N x N grid starting at top-left cell (0,0) and ending at bottom-right cell (N-1,N-1). You can only move either right or down at each step. Count the number of distinct paths using recursion.

Input Format:
A single integer N.

Output Format:
Print the count of paths.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
2

Sample Output
2
(Down,Right) or (Right,Down)

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
6
hintsList: From (i,j), you can go to (i+1,j) or (i,j+1) if inside grid. Base case when at (n-1,n-1) -> 1 path; if out of bounds -> 0.
